title: Top-Rated Armidale Stay with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Cocktails
description:
Nestled in New South Wales' New England High Country is one of Australia’s most elegant regional cities - Armidale. The rich history, foodie delights and complete tranquillity of this beautiful destination are yours to uncover from the stylish Powerhouse Hotel Armidale by Rydges - currently the #1 hotel in Armidale on Tripadvisor and recipient of its coveted Travellers' Choice Award 2020.

Located a short walk from the CBD and Curtis Park, this top-rated hotel is the perfect launchpad for discovering everything Armidale has to offer. Dubbed a 'Cathedral City' thanks to its ornate 19th-century churches, this attractive and graceful inland haven of tree-lined streets is best known for its vibrant cultural scene, World Heritage-listed national parks, cool-climate vineyards and fascinating cosmopolitan centre.

You can dip your toe into Armidale's culinary scene without even leaving the comfort of the hotel. Treat yourself to authentic regional dining at Azka Restaurant or a relaxed evening at Wine & Tapas Bar, which serves craft beers and cocktails alongside a tempting selection of wines and light bites.

title: Top-Rated New England High Country Escape
description:
Discover the unique heritage and beauty of one of Australia’s most elegant regional cities at Rydges Armidale, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor.

The perfect stop on a road trip between Sydney and Brisbane, or mini escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, this stylish hotel is in the New England High Country within driving distance of unique heritage walks, Wollomombi Falls, the scenic Waterfall Way, and the New England Highway. Experience local dishes inspired by an abundance of seasonal produce at Azka Restaurant and Wine and Tapas Bar (ranked in the top three restaurants in town on Tripadvisor), as well as access to 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi, a guest gym, laundry and Tesla charging station. With genuine hospitality and attentive service, this is the only place to stay in Armidale.
